name: Janet
detailed_location: Crimson Caravan CompanyNellis Air Force Base(optional)

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: You should go talk to Blake or Alice, they handle most of our contact with visitors.

topics.topic_text: I don't suppose you watch the Boomers over in Nellis sometimes, do you?
topics.response_text: I watch all sorts of things with my binoculars. Who wants to know, and why?

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Bye.

topics.topic_text: No reason. I'll be off now.
topics.response_text: Alright then, goodbye.

topics.topic_text: I've been inside Nellis. There's a young man there who has a crush on you.
topics.response_text: Nice-looking blonde boy? I always wondered if he was watching me back! What's he like?

topics.topic_text: He's nice, maybe a little naive. Seems convinced you're the love of his life.
topics.response_text: Really? That's so sweet!

topics.topic_text: He's a catch. You should see him blush when I flirt with him.
topics.response_text: Well, you don't have to do that anymore! Sounds like I better hurry to him.

topics.topic_text: He's a special sort of guy - perfect for a special sort of gal.
topics.response_text: Ooh, I've just got to meet him! Is there any way the Boomers would let me visit Nellis?

topics.topic_text: <Lie> You have permission. They know you're coming.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{Surprise}Really? Thank you so much! I'll get going right away.

topics.topic_text: I'm not sure. Let me think about it and I'll come back to you.
topics.response_text: Ok, let me know when you have an idea.

topics.topic_text: I'll ask Pearl to make an exception for you.
topics.response_text: This is so exciting! Let me know how it turns out.

topics.topic_text: I doubt it.
topics.response_text: Just my luck. I finally find the perfect guy, and he's a Boomer.

topics.topic_text: Actually, I wanted to talk to you about him again.
topics.response_text: I was hoping you would. What's going on?

topics.topic_text: He's doing well. I'll come back when I have some more information.
topics.response_text: Ok, talk to you soon.

topics.topic_text: I got a Boomer uniform for you to wear while you cross to Nellis.
topics.response_text: Well, with McLafferty dead, I guess my contract is done and I'm free to leave. I'm off to meet my admirer!

topics.topic_text: Not yet, but I hope to very soon.
topics.response_text: Okay, I'll be around.

topics.topic_text: I'm still working on it.
topics.response_text: Okay, well let me know what she says.

topics.topic_text: I convinced her to pay you what you're owed. You're free to leave.
topics.response_text: That's great! I can't believe you went through all this trouble for me. Thank you!

topics.topic_text: You're free to leave, but McLafferty won't pay you. That's the deal.
topics.response_text: I see. Well, thank you for trying. I'm off to go see my admirer now.

topics.topic_text: Well, you won't be getting any caps, but McLafferty won't be a problem for you.
topics.response_text: Oh, I see. Well, I guess I'm off to see my admirer now.

conversation.response_text: Hi there, it is great to meet you as well.
And you're even more handsome up close. Do you think it'll be okay if I hang around here for a little while, so we can get to know each other better?

description:
Janet is a 28 year-old Caucasian Female.

A young caravaneer with striking red hair working for the Crimson Caravan Company. She tends to the brahmin herd in the pens and maintains the surrounding area, with a visible fascination for the distant Nellis Air Force Base.

Janet's Personality: Observant and somewhat reserved with a hint of romantic curiosity. Janet is dedicated to her work but often finds herself gazing toward the horizon, particularly at Nellis Air Force Base where she watches a young man who appears to watch her in return.

Janet's Backstory: Born and raised in the Mojave Wasteland, Janet joined the Crimson Caravan Company as a teenager and has worked her way up from a simple hand to a trusted caravaneer. Though she's never been on a long caravan run, she's proven her worth through her dedication to the brahmin pens and her knowledge of wasteland survival. Her fascination with Nellis began when she noticed the young man watching her during her breaks, and now she keeps binoculars handy to observe him from a distance.
